Articles.Content:
![2mq2arq.jpg](http://i60.tinypic.com/2mq2arq.jpg)

this shows all 4 tracks although track 2 (grey) is hard to see

track 1 blue

track 2 grey

track 3 red

track 4 lime

class 1 stock

class 2 modded

rules

no rcs, just driving skill

no cutting corners

no larger than 3m wide by 3m high by 5m long cars - use small metal plates to measure craft - they are 1m

no more than 6 wheels

submit screenshot of start and finish and time - please use persistent trails

brown wheels only

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-24T03:46:09Z" title="05/24/2015 03:46  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 24, 2015</time> by KMC**

Does it go something like this? If this is ok, then it did track 1 in exactly 3m.

<iframe width="459" height="344" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/3D1zgPJwwTI?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

yep thats great. i cant play cause KSP is broken right now. these days everyone wants short races or circumnavs so i decided to mix em

im going to try them in the Badlaund.
